```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
babies <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ervance1/Sp2018-Data-Science-repo/master/babies2a.dat")
babies <- rename(babies, bwtoz = `bwt/oz`) #renaming `bwt/oz` because the "/" sign requires special care
```

**Tanner Individual Graph**
```{r}
ggplot(data=babies, mapping=aes(x=number, y=bwtoz))+geom_jitter()+facet_wrap(~ Premature)
```

**Drew Individual Graph**

```{r}
ggplot(data = babies, mapping = aes(x = gestation, y = bwtoz)) + geom_smooth(se = FALSE) + facet_wrap(~smoke)
```
